description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.NW1UYE4s8ZXM9iet]{Dancing Flames}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.CXjvdxT7YJ0h9IGE]{Mass Charm}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.BRWMNrh127oiasYt]{Phantasmal Horror}
